name: Stratedice
description:
An entry to the GMTK Game Jam 2022 by Jack Pavey.

In this turn-based strategy puzzler, Stratedice (which rhymes with strategize), roll your Dice (using WASD or ARROW keys) to eliminate the enemy Die. You can only eliminate Dice that have smaller number than you so you must navigate the grid and avoid higher number enemies while strategically taking out every enemy.

Background Music Theme:

"Smooth Lovin" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
